dashboard.label: darkfalcon_attack_path_internal
dashboard.description: Shows the weakest defenses against TTP's from an internal killchain.

html.h4:
This visual attempts to show what a successful attack on the company could look like based on the weakness of ratings against tactics, techniques and procedures (TTPs). We hen take these TTPs and lay them over an attack chain or attack phases from the perspective of an outside attacker. Any one or all tactics may be used so diligence must be help in continuing to secure the environment to those listed.
The attack phases below are groups of performed in time buckets and usefulness for the next attack group and are focused on an inside threat initiating the attack:
Phase 1 – Collect: This goal of this phase is to discover and move readily available data outside the environment
Phase 2 – Escalate: The goal of this phase is to create a stronger connection in the environment and elevate access to reach as many systems and as much data as possible
Phase 3 – Execute: This goal of this phase is to get code to execute in the environment to form a connection and allow additional attacks or code to execute to further an attack and impact

search.query:
|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Collection%")
| eval score_composite = DetectionScore + ResponseScore+SophisticationScore | eval score_composite=round((score_composite/300)*100) | sort score_composite | where score_composite < 30 | strcat Tactic "-" score_composite TacticNew | fields TacticNew | rename TacticNew as "Collection"
|appendcols [ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] | where like(Category,"%Exfiltration%")
| eval score_composite = DetectionScore + ResponseScore+SophisticationScore | eval score_composite=round((score_composite/300)*100) | sort score_composite | where score_composite < 30 | strcat Tactic "-" score_composite TacticNew | fields TacticNew | rename TacticNew as "Exfiltration"]
| transpose include_empty=false 20

|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Privilege Escalation%")
| eval score_composite = DetectionScore + ResponseScore+SophisticationScore | eval score_composite=round((score_composite/300)*100) | sort score_composite | where score_composite < 30 | strcat Tactic "-" score_composite TacticNew | fields TacticNew | rename TacticNew as "Privilege Escalation"

| eval score_composite = DetectionScore + ResponseScore+SophisticationScore | eval score_composite=round((score_composite/300)*100) | sort score_composite | where score_composite < 30 | strcat Tactic "-" score_composite TacticNew | fields TacticNew | rename TacticNew as "Credential Access"]
|appendcols [ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] | where like(Category,"%Discovery%")
| eval score_composite = DetectionScore + ResponseScore+SophisticationScore | eval score_composite=round((score_composite/300)*100) | sort score_composite | where score_composite < 30 | strcat Tactic "-" score_composite TacticNew | fields TacticNew | rename TacticNew as "Discovery"]
| transpose include_empty=false 20
